errors.formNotFoundMessage: The form you're looking for doesn't exist or you don't have permission to view it.
errors.general: An error occurred while processing your request.

generalSettings.title: General Settings
generalSettings.description: Basic form information and display settings
generalSettings.shortUrlHelp: Short URL is automatically generated. Click the refresh button to generate a new one.

thankYouSettings.title: Thank You Page
thankYouSettings.description: Customize the message displayed after form submission
thankYouSettings.enabledDescription: Show a custom message to users after they submit the form
thankYouSettings.messagePlaceholder: Thank you! Your response has been submitted.
thankYouSettings.messageHelp: This message will be displayed to users after they submit the form. You can use rich formatting including bold, italic, headings, lists, quotes, and links.
thankYouSettings.mentionHelp: Type @ to mention form fields ({{count}} available) and reference user responses.
thankYouSettings.noFieldsHelp: Add some fields to your form to enable @ mentions for personalizing messages.
